EmailTemplate.name: Acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Ground Support Solutions. Your case tracking number for this inquiry is provided above. If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry, you may reply to this e-mail -- please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Ground Support Solutions Quotes Team. The GSS Quotes Team has received your request and will provide additional information shortly.
Your case tracking number for this inquiry is provided above. If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry, you may reply to this e-mail -- please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
Best Regards,
Honeywell Aerospace Ground Support Solutions
